# Vertex IP (vertex-ip.com)

> Specialized patent prosecution and IP strategy services for deep-tech and hardware startups, led by an MIT-educated former USPTO Patent Examiner.

## Core Mission
Vertex IP provides high-precision patent drafting and landscape searching by leveraging firsthand experience from the USPTO and a deep technical background across multiple high-tech fields including aerospace, MEMS, and autonomous systems.

## Services
- **Patent Drafting:** Application drafting, claims strategy, and US/PCT formal drawings.
- **Patent Searching:** Prior art, landscape reports, Freedom to Operate (FTO), and patentability analysis.
- **Analytics & Prosecution:** Office Action responses, claim mapping, and litigation support.

## Areas of Technical Expertise
- **Autonomous Vehicles:** Vehicle control, navigation, and AI/ML robotics (Alex's former USPTO Art Unit).
- **Aerospace & Space Systems:** Avionics, ion propulsion, and orbital mechanics.
- **Hardware/MEMS:** Semiconductor fabrication, wafer processing, and microfluidics.
- **Advanced Computing:** Datacenters, 3DICs, HBM, and Photonic Integrated Circuits.
